name: Monty Python and the Holy Graal
name_original: Monty Python and the Holy Graal
description:
Monty Python and the Holy Graal Control

Use "A" "D" and "Space" to move and shoot the enemy and get the Holy Graal 

Pitch

This is a little game a made for a school project where I have to mix The movie "Monty python and the holy graal" and the game "Space invader"
